survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employees' awareness and satisfaction with mental health support services provided by the organization.

questions.question_text: How often do you utilize the mental health resources offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for clarity; ensure the options are mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How often do you utilize the mental health resources offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which of the following mental health services have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-select options should include an opt-out choice like 'None of the above'.

script.question_text: Which of the following mental health services have you used in the past 12 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accessibility of mental health resources at your workplace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accessibility of mental health resources at your workplace?

questions.question_text: What additional mental health support would you like your employer to provide?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback; limit response length to 200 characters.

script.question_text: What additional mental health support would you like your employer to provide?

questions.question_text: Have you ever felt discouraged from using workplace mental health resources due to concerns about confidentiality?
questions.client_notes: Binary response with an 'Unsure' option to accommodate uncertainty.

script.question_text: Have you ever felt discouraged from using workplace mental health resources due to concerns about confidentiality?
